neighboring non-SMGL-supported districts. 
For example, pregnant women living in the 
northern part of the SMGL-supported district of 
Kolomo, a rural region far from any CEmONC 
facility, are referred to Choma Regional Hospital 
in a neighboring non-SMGL-supported district. 
C-sections performed at this facility would not 
have been counted in the SMGL assessments. 
In Uganda, the increase in C-sections during 
Phase 1 of the SMGL Initiative was primarily
